post.text: "That reporter and I have the same condition. When Mr. Trump made fun of him, that hurt my feelings."

comment.author: Savannah
comment.text: Y'all Donald trump fans are so ungrateful ! Don't you see what Hillary is doing! She helping us. And what has Donald been doing nothing cause he's not a man he is a harasser to women mocks disability! Last he ends up to be racist and try to deport us ! We need to stand up and vote now ! Vote for #HillaryClinton

replies.author: Savannah
replies.text: According to research trump has told more lies than Hillary !

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Vote for Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton 2016 2016 2016 Seriously did you really just say that because that was the smartest thing I've heard somebody everybody said it was awesome Yeah I was thinking about the same time as well as the first Black President of America and Europe and North Carolina and I will have the option to purchase a new phone and email address in your home I really wish when that guy had delivered that gravel he would not have went through the field and got stuck because then he had to have his co-worker come and get them unstuck with the other pickup truck because the other pickup truck is 4-wheel drive in the truck that they were home and gravel in wasn't for all driving I got stuck that's too bad The hip the Hop the hippity hop the hippity hop The Hip Hop the hippity hoppity hippity hop What's the what's the weather Happy Thanksgiving merry Christmas happy New Year and in case I don't see you next year happy Easter Well golly gee whiz are you going to go trick or treating? Happy Halloween my fellow Americans may you have a haunted Halloween evening COME ON GO GRAB SOME FREEDOM FRIES AND FREEDOM TOAST Yeah GO UP ON THAT MOUNTAIN AND GRAB SOME FREEDOM OF COURSE Go out there AMERICA AND GRAB SOME FREEDOM Hey my brothers and sisters get out there and vote and do what Americans do thank you very much The question is will you vote for Donald J Trump or Hillary Clinton in 2016 either way take care of yourself and have a great American day We have the choice to elect Hillary or a psychotic, egomaniac, racist who will trample the constitution and our democracy. Please please vote everyone! #ImWithHer #Hillary2016 If Hillary becomes president the only people she will help is herself, her family, and her donors. It's time to take back our country. #Trump16 come on everybody let's have a little fun vote for Hillary Clinton in 2016 and Donald J Trump 2016 yeah you can vote for both of them sounds like fun don't it? HILLARY! What amazes me is that ANY man with a daughter, wife, mother, could EVER vote for a misogynistic, sexist, sleaze like Drumpf! MY husband nearly jumped out of his chair when he saw him run his hands down his own DAUGHTER'S body at the Convention! I thought he would have a stroke, as he yelled: "INCEST TOO? His supporters completely ignore his racism and ignorance, fraud,and failure to pay his bills as well. Hillary Clinton.. forget the smear and lies campaign against her that are in fact check continuing to be false... who is the bigger lier? Trump.. who lost millions of emails? Bush Trump knows nothing about politics he thinks running the country is like running one of his businesses. Imagine Trumps wife becoming the First Lady really c'mon people be for real. Hillary Clinton is our next president. Hillary Clinton ...at this point in time people really should have taken it upon themselves to research the candidates, but after reading some of these comments I can see many haven't bothered. There's more to research than sitting in front of the TV watching fox news with your hand in your pants. Neither one but I m voting for the lesser evil Hillary Clinton. Hopefully we will survive her long enough to get a true outsider to safe us undesirables and the world. Donald is the total opposite, an Opportunist, bigot, dictator, supremist, that will help destroy us tomorrow. Trump. Any red blooded American truly knows how evil and corrupt Hillary is. She's going down. Why do you think she just sent 1.8 billion dollars to a Saudi bank? She knows it's over Hahahahaha I live in Florida and 45 members of my family do too. we have not yet voted, and we are ALL voting for Trump/Pence and the whole republican ticket!!!! I bet you 13456324567 dollars you didn't read that number. You just skipped right over it. You didn't even realize I put a letter in it. No I didn't but you went back and looked. I want my like.
